title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Waste
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Waste 

Directive) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: In these Regulations – “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – “Principal Regulations” means the European 

Communities (Waste Directive) Regulations 2011 (No. 126 of 2011)
text_norm: 2 regulation - principal regulation mean european community (waste directive) regulation 2011 (no 126 2011)

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following: 

“ “Minister” means the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.” 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 May, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

1 OJ No. L312, 22.11.2008, p.3 
2 OJ No. L365, 19.12.2014, p.89 
3 OJ No. L184, 11.07.2015, p.13 
4 OJ No. L150, 14.6.2017, p.1 
5 OJ No. L150, 14.6.2018, p.109 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [166] 3

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Communities (Waste Directive) 
Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 126 of 201) to clarify the Minister with responsibility 
for the functions set out therein and to give further effect to Directive 
2008/98/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 November 
2008 on waste and repealing certain Directives. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [166]
